**Database and ETL Consultant - BODS, SQL Server**
**Business Objects Data Services, BODS, ETL, Support, Developer**
A Database developer with Business Objects Data Services is needed for a hands on role at a well established BI specialist. This is the perfect role for someone with two or more years of experience in BODS support or development experience who wants some excellent access to some of the best industry training for SSIS/SAP HANA/Hadoop. This company works with blue chip organisations across the UK but very minimal travel is required
As a Database and ETL consultant (SQL Server, BODS) you will develop and maintain solutions that support online reporting and business applications. Using Business Objects Data Services you will design, develop and maintain ETL processes.
Key skills
* **Business Objects Data Services/BODS - 2 years +** * **SQL Server - stored procedures, functions, views** * Degree educated * Excellent communication skills * Understanding of SDLC
Desirable skills
* SSIS * SAP Hana * Hadoop *MongoDB
This role will be fast paced and challenging and will be around 60% support and 40% development. It would suit someone who wants to work with prestigious clients and train on the latest Big Data/Analytics technologies with the view to progressing their career in full development/consultancy.
This role can pay up to Â£42k + Benefits and Bonus. Please send an updated CV
Venturi is a staffing business dedicated to you, differentiating ourselves in the marketplace by quality of service and candidate delivery. Our highly skilled and experienced staff operate within dedicated markets to give you the best service possible. Venturi markets include Development & Design, Business Intelligence, IT & Infrastructure Support. Venturi operates as an employment agency and employment business. No terminology in this advert is intended to discriminate on the grounds of age, and we confirm that we are happy to accept applications from persons of any age for this role.
